headline.zh: Investment / Research Analyst｜AI & Tech（VC / Public Markets）
headline.en: Investment & Research Analyst | AI & Tech (VC / Public Markets)

lead.zh: 把行业叙事拆成可验证假设，把数据与模型沉淀为可复用尽调流程，把结论写成可决策的投资备忘录。
lead.en: I translate AI & tech narratives into testable theses, structured diligence, and decision-ready investment memos.

oneLiner.zh: AI/科技投研：用结构化框架把不确定性压缩成可投资判断。
oneLiner.en: AI & tech research: compress uncertainty into investable decisions with structured diligence.

value.zh: 论点 → 尽调 → 决策
TAM / 单位经济 / 估值

zh: 把模糊研究问题拆成可验证假设与明确评价标准
快速搭建市场/竞争/单位经济/估值分析，输出决策级 memo
用数据与模板把尽调流程产品化，提升一致性与可复用性
en: Turn ambiguous questions into testable theses and clear evaluation criteria
Build market/competition/unit-econ/valuation analysis into decision-ready memos
Productize diligence with data + reusable templates for consistent decisions

contactTitle.zh: Open to Work / 合作交流

contactText.zh: 如果你在寻找 AI/科技方向投研与尽调支持（VC / Public Markets / 研究团队），我可以快速把研究问题结构化并交付可决策结论。
contactText.en: If you need AI/tech diligence and research support, I can turn ambiguous questions into structured analysis and decision-ready outputs.

contactMeta.zh: New York, NY｜可远程｜可按需出差
contactMeta.en: New York, NY | Remote | Open to travel

subtitle.zh: AI 与科技方向投研与尽调：把研究结论写成可决策的 memo，并把方法沉淀为可复用的流程。
subtitle.en: AI & tech investing research and diligence—turning insights into decision-ready memos and reusable operating playbooks.

zh: 我专注 AI 与科技方向的投研与尽调，经历覆盖早期 VC 研究，以及公开市场研究/估值支持。
我的优势是把研究流程做成“可复用系统”：市场空间（TAM/CAGR）、竞争格局与差异化、单位经济（burn/runway）、可比公司与估值逻辑，并将结论沉淀为结构化投资备忘录，支持团队更快更一致地决策。
en: I focus on AI & tech investing research and diligence, with exposure across early-stage VC research and public-market research/valuation support.

My edge is building repeatable diligence systems—market sizing (TAM/CAGR), competitive mapping, unit economics (burn/runway), comps/valuation—and translating findings into crisp, decision-ready investment memos.

zh: 研究框架：TAM/CAGR、竞争格局、护城河与风险映射
尽调模型：单位经济、burn/runway、可比与估值
工具链：Excel + SQL + Python（pandas），把分析流程产品化
en: Frameworks: TAM/CAGR, competitive landscape, moat & risk mapping
Diligence: unit economics, burn/runway, comps & valuation
Tooling: Excel + SQL + Python (pandas) to productize analysis workflows

v.zh: AI & Tech 投研 / 尽调
全职 / 实习 / 兼职（按需）

title.zh: AI-Agent 平台对比研究与评分框架
title.en: AI-Agent Platform Comparative Research & Scoring Framework

summary.zh: 建立跨公司可比的评价维度与评分体系，支持投资选择与资本配置决策。
summary.en: Built cross-company evaluation criteria and scoring to support investment selection and capital allocation.

description.zh: 围绕性能、可扩展性、效率与可靠性等维度，定义可量化/可复用框架，并将结论沉淀为伙伴评审用建议简报与讨论材料。
description.en: Defined a reusable framework across performance, scalability, efficiency, and reliability, translating findings into partner-ready recommendation briefs.

zh: 形成可复用评分维度与模板（内部）
产出对比表与结论摘要
支持伙伴/IC讨论
制定评价框架与评分口径
标准化数据并完成对比分析
输出简报与讨论要点

title.zh: 半导体研究数据库与校验流程

summary.zh: 搭建公司财务与市场数据集，使用 SQL/Python 校验与对账，提升研究效率与数据一致性。
summary.en: Built datasets and validated/reconciled with SQL/Python to improve research efficiency and consistency.

description.zh: 覆盖设计、foundry、OSAT 等环节，整理披露与市场数据库数据，形成可复用数据底座与校验流程，支持研究报告产出。
description.en: Consolidated filings and market databases into reusable datasets and validation routines supporting research write-ups.

zh: 数据清洗与对账流程
研究数据库维护
支持分析师报告
建立数据表结构与口径
SQL/Python 校验与对账
趋势与驱动因素分析

summary.zh: 这是一个占位示例。用你的真实 PDF 替换 assets/docs/2025/12/sample-investment-memo.pdf，并按同样方式新增条目。
summary.en: Placeholder example. Replace the sample PDF under assets/docs/2025/12/ and add your own entries.

zh: 进行早期 AI 与科技公司投研与市场分析，支持投资 thesis 与 sourcing 策略
分析行业趋势、TAM/CAGR、竞争格局与融资动态，筛选高潜机会并维护 deal pipeline
完成尽调与财务分析：单位经济、burn rate、runway、估值与可比分析
撰写投资备忘录与研究简报，归纳 upside、downside 与关键风险点
en: Conducted investment research and market analysis on early-stage AI & tech companies, supporting thesis development and sourcing strategy
Analyzed trends, TAM/CAGR, competitive landscapes, and funding dynamics; screened opportunities and maintained a prioritized deal pipeline
Performed diligence and financial analysis including unit economics, burn rate, runway, valuation and comps
Prepared investment memos and research briefs summarizing upside potential, downside risks, and key risk factors

zh: 对 AI-agent 平台进行对比研究，支持投资选择与资本配置决策
搭建评价框架与评分体系：性能、可扩展性、效率、可靠性等维度跨公司对比
使用 Wind / 公共数据 / Excel / Python（pandas）标准化并分析财务与运营数据
完成 benchmarking 与情景分析，形成 partner 评审用投资建议简报与 IC 讨论材料
en: Conducted comparative investment research on AI-agent platforms to support selection and capital allocation decisions
Developed evaluation frameworks and scoring criteria across performance, scalability, efficiency, and reliability
Standardized and analyzed financial/operational data using Wind, public datasets, Excel, and Python (pandas)
Executed benchmarking and scenario analyses; synthesized findings into partner-ready recommendation briefs

zh: 覆盖半导体价值链（设计、foundry、OSAT）的行业研究与公司研究支持
搭建并维护研究数据库（财务与市场数据），使用 SQL 与 Python 进行校验与对账
分析财务表现、盈利驱动与行业趋势，支持分析师研究报告产出
en: Supported equity and industry research across the semiconductor value chain (design, foundry, OSAT)
Built and maintained research datasets; used SQL and Python for validation and reconciliation
Analyzed financial performance, profitability drivers, and industry trends to support senior analyst reports

zh: 搭建交易定价支持用可比公司估值表（Revenue/EBITDA multiples、P/E）
完成财务分析与同行基准分析，支持资本市场交易与投资者材料
协助风险因素分析与尽调，支持信息披露与 downside 评估
en: Built valuation comparables (revenue multiples, EBITDA multiples, P/E) to support transaction pricing and investment analysis
Conducted financial analysis and peer benchmarking for capital markets transactions and investor presentations
Assisted in risk factor analysis and diligence, supporting disclosures and downside assessment

zh: 投资研究
行业分析
公司分析
投资 thesis
尽调
IC memo 写作
组合监控
可比公司分析
估值（multiples）
单位经济模型
burn/runway
情景分析
Excel
SQL
Python（pandas）
Tableau
Wind
数据清洗与对账

meta.title: 李锦元 Lee｜投研与尽调

hero.eyebrow: 把研究写成结论，把结论写成决策

projects.title: 代表性项目
projects.subtitle: 重点展示 3–6 个最能代表你能力的项目（可继续扩展）。

research.title: 研究/案例库
research.subtitle: 按年月持续沉淀投资分析与宏观/行业研究。支持搜索与按年份/月/类别筛选。
research.empty: 暂无文档。把 PDF 放到 assets/docs/YYYY/MM/ 下面，并在 content.json -> documents 里新增一条记录。

experience.title: 经历
experience.subtitle: 用动作 + 影响 + 指标写经历，避免流水账。

skills.title: 技能
skills.subtitle: 按能力域分组，而不是关键词堆砌。

contact.title: 联系
contact.subtitle: 让机会更容易找到你。
contact.resumeHint: 把你的 PDF 放到 assets/resume.pdf 即可生效。

meta.title: Jinyuan Li (Lee) | Investment & Research
meta.description: Portfolio site: AI & tech investing research, diligence, experience, and case library.

hero.eyebrow: Turn research into theses. Turn theses into decisions.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: Show a few representative projects (you can expand anytime).

research.title: Research Library
research.subtitle: A running archive of investing and macro/industry write-ups, organized by year/month with filters and search.
research.empty: No documents yet. Put PDFs under assets/docs/YYYY/MM/ and add entries to content.json -> documents.

experience.title: Experience
experience.subtitle: Use action + impact + metric. Avoid a task list.

skills.title: Skills
skills.subtitle: Group skills by capability domains—not keyword soup.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Make it easy for opportunities to reach you.
contact.resumeHint: Put your PDF at assets/resume.pdf and it will work.
